template: SELECT MIN(char_name.id) AS char_name_id, MIN(company_type.kind) AS company_type_kind, MIN(company_name.country_code) AS company_name_country_code FROM company_name, char_name, movie_companies, title, cast_info, company_type WHERE cast_info.movie_id = title.id AND cast_info.person_role_id = char_name.id AND movie_companies.movie_id = title.id AND company_name.id = movie_companies.company_id AND company_type.id = movie_companies.company_type_id AND company_name.name LIKE %s AND company_name.country_code != %s AND cast_info.note LIKE %s AND company_name.country_code = %s AND company_name.name NOT LIKE %s AND title.production_year > %s AND cast_info.note IN ('(voice)', '(voice: Japanese version)', '(voice) (uncredited)', '(voice: English version)') AND title.production_year < %s AND title.episode_nr > %s AND movie_companies.note LIKE %s AND title.episode_nr < %s AND company_type.kind = %s;
